module.name: CallerID Lookup
module.description: Allows CallerID Lookup of incoming calls against different sources (OpenCNAM, MySQL, HTTP, ENUM, Phonebook Module)
module.changelog: *13.0.12.6* Packaging of ver 13.0.12.6 *13.0.12.5* Small whitespace change for release testing. *13.0.12.4* FREEPBX-19791 CallerID Lookup leaves number URL encoded after latest update *13.0.12.3* Fixing FREEPBX-18685 CallerId Lookup does not urlencode plus(+) sign *13.0.12.2* FREEPBX-15832 *13.0.12.1* FREEPBX-13255 add maxlength onto input box *13.0.12* FREEPBX-13255: CallerIDLookup host field characters limit too low *13.0.11* FREEPBX-12951 Remove auto-generated opencnam source. move db to doctrine *13.0.10* FREEPBX-11552 - Fix cache logic. Also more opencnam cleanup. move rate limit to 10 based on current info from site..., FREEPBX-11718 Remove the ability to add new.. *13.0.9* CallerID Lookup Sources 'None' entry uses OpenCNAM *13.0.8* Use "/usr/bin/env php" to start script *13.0.7* FREEPBX-10774 *13.0.6* Floating menu update *13.0.5* FREEPBX-8172 Add tokens to path to allow path style lookups *13.0.4* FREEPBX-9575 Run after privacy manager. *13.0.3* FREEPBX-9578 Field Query in CIDLookup settings is loaded from database incorrectly *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha3* Cleanup *13.0.1alpha2* FREEPBX-9039 Remove Departments from FreePBX *13.0.1alpha1* Visual Changes
